name: MYSTAGEPRO.COM
tag_list: professional-profiles, dance-jobs, opera-singers, unsigned-bands, musicians, arrangers, choreographers
overview:
MyStagePro is a web-site builder, online directory for the international entertainment industry, castings database, networking center and entertainment video broadcast channels covering opera, musical theater, unsigned music acts, international speciality acts, dance companies and backstage production insights and documentaries.

The site provides extensive career management strategies including archives of international names providing video advice and editorial containing guidance on the professional aspects across the international entertainment world.

A strategic set of partnerships with the owners of extensive archives of exclusive rare ballet footage, rare musical theatre clips and video archives of other projects enables MYSTAGEPRO to be a destination for audiences and afficianados of entertainment material which they have found is difficult to access on other video sharing sites or unavailable elsewhere.

MYSTAGEPRO also enables producers of new theatre and entertainment production projects to publicise their activities directly on-site in dedicated broadcast Video Engines. Production Partners can leverage direct ticket-sales opportunities through embedded click-through advertising opportunities served out by AD-SERVERS, both 3rd party and embedded within the MYSTAGEPRO site on their Promotional videos.

The editorial pages are geared towards maximising the employment opportunities for professionals from all disciplines including technical and creatives, who also have discreet profile upload facilities. The extensive editorial pages provide reliable links and sources, “how and who to approach” advice and where to go for a wide spectrum of employment opportunities within the broad international entertainment industry outside the traditional and occasionally limited general view of the “established” Show Business centres, including experimental and mainstream Opera, English Speaking Theatre companies, the “serious” dance scene, physical theatre and circus projects and many of the other non-convential and less commercially focused potential employers of skilled “theatre” professionals.

The information directories are compiled to ensure the broadest collection of relevant industry information, updated daily. All diretories are separately archived, in order for direct searches to be made using the on-site Seach functions.
